title: Episode 290: Loan Forgiveness and Lying to Pollsters
itunes:title: Episode 290: Loan Forgiveness and Lying to Pollsters
description:
We discuss two topics in-depth this week: student loan forgiveness and lying to pollsters. There’s an interesting technique for distinguishing between what voters say they believe and what they actually believe, and there’s a recent poll that uses this technique in asking people about their attitudes toward controversial topics.
